Package com.appriskgame.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MapReadAndWrite
    Map read and write interface
    ReadAndWrite
    read and write game map interface
    SaveAndLoad
    Interface for save and load game map object
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CardController
    This class is used for Card allocation and exchange of cards for armies.
    ConnectedGraph
    This Class containing the method to check whether a map is a connected graph or not
    GameSaveLoad
    This Class is used for saving and loading game map
    MapAdapter
    This class is used for map read and write using adapter pattern
    MapOperations
    The MapOperations class is for loading the contents with Continents, respective Countries and also for getting the map details for other classes
    MapValidation
    This class is used to check the format of List of continents, List of countries, adjacency between countries which are present in the uploaded file and validate the map.
    Player
    This class contains methods which will take the input to add or remove players , Populate countries to players randomly , to allocate armies to the players initially and then place the remaining armies in round robin fashion.
    ReadAndWriteDomination
    This class is used for read and write of domination file
    ReadAndWriteMapConquest
    This Class contains method for read and write of conquest game map using adapter patern
    RoundRobinAllocator
    This class is used to iterate the Players Turns.
    Tournament
    This Class is used for implementation of Tournament Mode
